about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description:
We are a company committed to providing solutions for the industrial sector of wires and power conductor cables, with equipment and services that ensure the efficiency and continuity of your operations.

With decades of experience in the market, we manufacture high-performance equipment to meet customized demands of power conductor cable manufacturers. Our reach extends beyond national borders, with established contracts in countries like Chile, Argentina, and Spain, consolidating our international presence.

Our commitment goes beyond manufacturing. We offer technical support and specialized maintenance, ensuring your equipment is always in full operation, minimizing downtime, and maximizing your business productivity. We understand that each industry has unique challenges, so we develop tailored solutions to meet the specific needs of each client, whether in the national or international market.

our_departments.title: Our Departments
our_departments.engineering_description: Our engineering department is responsible for developing innovative solutions, designing equipment and systems to meet the specific needs of each client, ensuring high efficiency and quality.
our_departments.machining_description:
Our Machining department is dedicated to the manufacturing of high-precision parts, using CNC machining centers, CNC lathes, conventional machines, and state-of-the-art equipment. We cater to both small demands and complex, custom projects, always focusing on quality, efficiency, and strict deadlines.

Our expertise ensures solutions that meet the highest standards, from development to final production, with special attention to details and finishes.
our_departments.assembly_description:
We integrate mechanical and electronic components, delivering complete and customized systems.

Our qualified team performs assembly of devices, machines, and highly complex equipment, always ensuring perfect interaction between components. We guarantee that every delivered solution operates efficiently, safely, and within the technical standards required by the market.

hero.title: We Drive the Industry
hero.description: We offer complete solutions to ensure your operation never stops.

product.title: Products
product.subtitle: High-Quality Machines and Equipment
product.banner_01_description: Explore the latest machines and equipment that will revolutionize your production line!
product.banner_02_description: Access the best equipment when needed. Rent with ease and efficiency!
product.banner_03_description: Discover how our solutions can add value to your business. Together, we are stronger!

torcedeira_rigida.title: Rigid Twister
torcedeira_rigida.description:
This equipment can include modules (cages) with 6, 12, 18 bobbins, and others upon request.

This machine is designed for twisting copper and aluminum wires or cables using standardized bobbins with a diameter of 630mm, arranged linearly along the main axis in sections called cages.

We offer a twisting line composed of three stages: one unit with six bobbins, one unit with twelve bobbins, one with eighteen bobbins, and others upon request. Suitable for both cable formation and shielding.

buncher_630_1800.title: Buncher's 630 - 1600
buncher_630_1800.description:
The Buncher's are double-twist machines for manufacturing copper and aluminum conductor cables, offering high performance with power ranging from 20KW to 180KW, linear speeds up to 300m/min, and twists up to 5000T/min depending on the equipment.

We offer Buncher 630, Buncher 800, Buncher 1000, Buncher 1250, and Buncher 1600.

desenrolador_duplo.title: Double Payoff 630-800 and 1000-1250
desenrolador_duplo.description:
This motorized payoff is designed to feed Buncher's and other equipment requiring continuous supply with controlled tension of bare or insulated wires.

Its maximum speed is 300m/min, using standardized bobbins with diameters from 630mm-800mm and from 1000mm to 1250mm.

bobinador_desbobinador_portal.title: Portal Winder and Unwinder
bobinador_desbobinador_portal.description:
These portal-type machines are designed to accommodate a wide range of bobbins. Their structure moves automatically via motorized mechanical transmission, allowing for closing, lifting, and cable spreading for the winding type. They are controlled simultaneously with the production line speed where installed.

They are developed according to each client's needs.

desenrolador_multiplo.title: Multiple Payoff
desenrolador_multiplo.description:
This motorized payoff is designed to feed Buncher's and other equipment requiring continuous supply with controlled tension of bare or insulated wires.

This equipment accommodates multiple bobbins with diameters ranging from 600mm to 800mm. Its maximum linear speed is 300 m/min.

planetaria_1000.title: Planetary 1000
planetaria_1000.description: This planetary stranding line is designed for assembling aluminum cables into bobbins with a diameter of 1000mm.

multifilar_8_fios.title: 8-Wire Multifilar (TM8)
multifilar_8_fios.description:
The multi-wire drawing line is designed for producing copper wires for conductor cables, including flexible cables, automotive cables, battery cables, building installation cables, photovoltaic cables, data cables, special cables, and others.

The SUPICOM drawing line includes the Drawing Unit, Annealer, and Winderâ€”a compact line working in synchronization using advanced and updated industrial technology.

desenrolador_vergalhao.title: Rod Payoff
desenrolador_vergalhao.description: Specialized payoff for rods, designed to provide smooth and controlled unwinding of heavy materials like metal rods.

enfitadeira.title: Taping Machine
enfitadeira.description: Machine designed to apply tapes accurately and efficiently on various types of cables and wires, ensuring proper protection and insulation.

aplicadores_de_linhas.title: SZ Line
aplicadores_de_linhas.description: Specialized equipment for twisting and precise application of lines in cable production processes, ensuring proper alignment and tension.

puxadores.title: Capstans
puxadores.description: Traction and control systems for cable production lines, providing precise control of speed and tension during the manufacturing process.

bobinadores.title: Winders
bobinadores.description: Equipment designed to wind cables and wires uniformly and consistently onto bobbins, ensuring efficient storage and transportation.

desbobinadores.title: Unwinders
desbobinadores.description: Specialized machines for unwinding cables and wires from bobbins in a controlled manner, feeding production lines or installation processes.

mono_torcao.title: Single Twist
mono_torcao.description: This machine is designed to provide simple twisting of cables or bundling of multiple cables that require twisting, ensuring the final cable diameter does not exceed 40 mm. Ideal for producing flexible cables and bundling special cables. For more information, consult us.

others.title: Other Equipment
others.description:
Supicom develops specialized equipment such as:

- Roll slitters
- Respooling lines
- Linear tape applicators with one or two heads
- Annealer
- Caterpillar

news.title: Highlights
news.subtitle: Stay up-to-date with the latest news

service.subtitle: Customized Industrial Solutions for Your Business
service.manufacturing_description: We provide specialized machines and equipment for the production of copper and aluminum wires and cables, including flexible, communication, control, battery, photovoltaic, data, special cables, and others.
service.rent_description: We offer rental of commercial and industrial machines and equipment without operators, suitable for various needs.
service.maintenance_description: We provide maintenance and repair services for industrial machines, ensuring maximum efficiency and longevity of the equipment.
service.development_description: We develop customized industrial projects, from planning to execution, ensuring innovative and efficient solutions for your business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Didn't find what you needed? Check out some answers to common questions.
faq.question_01_title: What are the main sectors served by Supicom?
faq.question_01_description: Supicom serves industries in the sectors of cables, power conductor wires, and other metallurgical areas that require high-performance equipment for their operations.
faq.question_02_description: We offer everything from the development and manufacturing of custom equipment to technical support, specialized maintenance, and personalized service to ensure maximum efficiency and longevity of our clients' equipment.
faq.question_03_title: Does Supicom serve clients outside Brazil?
faq.question_03_description: Yes, we operate internationally with clients in countries such as Chile, Argentina, and Spain, consolidating our presence and trust beyond Brazil.
faq.question_04_title: What are the differentiators of Supicom's products?
faq.question_04_description: Our products are developed with cutting-edge technology, always focusing on durability, efficiency, and adaptation to the specific needs of each client, in addition to offering continuous technical support.
faq.question_05_title: How can I request a quote?
faq.question_05_description: You can request a quote through our website by adding products to the quote request or contacting us directly. A representative will respond with the necessary information.
faq.question_06_title: Does Supicom offer maintenance and support for equipment?
faq.question_06_description: Yes, we offer specialized maintenance services and technical support to ensure your equipment operates efficiently with minimal downtime.
faq.question_07_title: Can I customize equipment for my production line?
faq.question_07_description: Yes, our equipment can be tailored to meet the specific needs of your operation, ensuring alignment with your production processes.

contact.description: Get in touch with us for support, to send suggestions, or to discuss partnerships. We are always ready to help.
contact.customer_support_description: Have questions or need help? Contact us for immediate support.
contact.suggestions_description: Send us your suggestions and help us improve our services.
contact.partnerships_description: Interested in partnerships? Contact us to explore collaboration opportunities.

form.title: Get in Touch
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and describe your request. Our team will get back to you soon!

request_quote.title: Request a Quote
request_quote.subtitle: Enter your details, and a representative will contact you shortly.
